object.creator: 杨智勇
object.name: lcIB_FKYJHFLCB
object.package: 100_新三板.挂牌阶段.06-反馈意见回复流程表

column.name: BZSM_copy
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
在底稿系统中完成“监管机构审核反馈阶段”底稿上传工作，才能发起反馈意见回复流程'

column.name: LDSP
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/suggestion.sdo?LcbdID="+ID+"&Lcbd=lcIB_FKYJHFLCB"+"&Ywlx=110000";
"<iframe id='lc_zyldyj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"

column.name: XMMC
column.comment: 内核流程及内核签章流程完成后，方可发起反馈回复流程。

column.name: DGSCBL
column.describe: 监管反馈阶段底稿上传比例

column.name: FKHFCS
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  key = ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) +1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_FKYJHFLCB WHERE XMMC = ?",[XMMC]);
key

column.name: ZXRZNSHRY
column.describe: 投资银行总部职能审批人员

constraint.SQL: ["tUser.OrgID in (select id from lborganization start with id = 13831 connect by prior id = fid)",[]]
["tUser.OrgID in (select id from lborganization start with id = 13831 connect by prior id = fid)",[]]

column.name: NMXXDJB
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/excelOut?ywlx=110000&insid='+InstID+'&lcbd=lcIB_FKYJHFLCB'; '' //'下载'

column.name: NHBZS
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select t1.NHZY_ZS from ECIF.lcIB_NHLCB t1 inner join jgcrm.os_wfentry t2 on t2.id=t1.instid where t2.state=4 and t1.XMMC=? and rownum = 1 order by t1.instid desc",[XMMC])

column.name: SHXT
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var i = ABS_LOADBEAN('com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.apexsoft.livebosbean.PageJumpToAms');
//var url=i.getLivebosPageUrl('admin','tIB_ZSHRW','tIB_ZSHRW_XJRW','');
var url=i.getCompleteUrl($Login.User.UserID,'/bss/ams/page/index.sdo#task')
 '<input type="button" onclick=\'window.open("'+url+'")\' value="审核系统" />'
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: ZKBSFYYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0&&ZKBSFYYJ == null
column.disable-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: ZKZYSHYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||ZKBSFYYJ != 1

column.name: SHYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||ZKBSFYYJ != 1

column.name: ZKBDGYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||ZKBSFYYJ != 1

column.name: DGYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||ZKBSFYYJ != 1

column.name: ZKBQTYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||ZKBSFYYJ != 1

column.name: QTYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||ZKBSFYYJ != 1

column.name: ZKBSHYJHZ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1= ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam  where paramname='ams.system'");
var cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.lcIB_FKYJHFLCB_ZKBSHYJHZ where lcIB_FKYJHFLCB_ID=?",[ID]);
(cnt1==0&&cnt2==0)||( cnt1==1 && ZKBSFYYJ==null)

column.name: SFCJYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: ZKBSHYJ1
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||SFCJYJ != 1

column.name: ZKBSHYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||SFCJYJ != 1
column.disable-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'" ) == 1

column.name: ZKXCGZBG
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: ZKBXCGZBG
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0
column.disable-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'" ) == 1

column.name: BZSM
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
请确保上传的附件与公文正文中列示的文件保持一致、该附件框中每一附件类型中仅上传一份最新版本附件至协同平台，用户可新增附件类型行'

column.name: DBXZ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/gdlcDown?lcbdid='+ID+'&insid='+InstID+'&fjlx=1'+'&yhid='+$Login.User; '' //'下载'

column.name: FYYBCWJ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> O_THIS.getColumn("FYYBCWJ").setLabel("非用印备查文件
(不上传至OA)");

column.name: OASPXX
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_FKYJHFLCB' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/oAsuggestion.sdo?oaWorkId="+oaid+"&lcbd=lcIB_FKYJHFLCB&lcbdId="+ID;
"<iframe id='lc_oayj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_GS_SBCLSH' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
oaid<=0
